jcr:content.jcr:title: G603 - Claymore
jcr:content.seoDescription: Logitech G603 wireless gaming mouse with ergonomic design, advanced HERO optical sensor, multi-device support, and LIGHTSPEED wireless technology with 1 ms report rate.
jcr:content.seoPageTitle: Logitech G603 Lightspeed Wireless Gaming Mouse

banner_copy_block.mainDescription: G603, with the revolutionary HERO sensor and LIGHTSPEED wireless technology, lets you play without wiresâ€”without limits. Enhanced with 10x sensor efficiency, this is a breakthrough in battery life and the new standard in wireless gaming.

bannercopyblock.mainDescription: G603, with the revolutionary HERO sensor and LIGHTSPEED wireless technology, delivers exceptionally accurate and consistent performance and a breakthrough in battery life setting a new standard in wireless gaming.

item3.featurevalue: 500 HourBattery life may vary based on user, battery discharge characteristics and computing conditions

copyblock.mainTitle: MEET HERO SENSOR - NEXT GENERATION GAMING MOUSE SENSOR
INTRODUCING G603 AND G613- PLAY WITHOUT LIMITS
G603 AND G613 - BREAK FREE FROM THE CABLE

copyblock.mainDescription: HERO is a revolutionary new optical sensor designed by Logitech G to deliver class-leading performance and up to 10 times the power efficiency (compared to previous gen). HERO sensor delivers exceptionally accurate and consistent performance with zero smoothing, filtering or acceleration from 200 to 12,000 DPI.

media_tile.altText: Graph: no other competitor listed matches HERO's simultaneous high power efficiency and high performance
media_tile.text: HERO is a true breakthrough innovation in  sensor technology providing revolutionary performance and efficiency. Itâ€™s the first of its kind to enable high-performance and long-lasting wireless gaming mice.

media_tile_copy.text: HERO utilizes a smart power management system to continuously adjust frame-rate processing based on mouse speeds. This allows for optimized by constantly managing and minimizing power consumption for up to 10x efficiency compared to previous generation sensor.

media_tile_copy_1282002099.altText: Graph: At high velocities around 400 IPS, HERO delivers accuracy across the full DPI range while competitors offer accuracy at a much smaller range
media_tile_copy_1282002099.text: HERO delivers accuracy at velocities over 400 IPS across the full DPI rangeâ€”from 200-12,000â€”with zero smoothing, acceleration or filtering. HERO sensor gives players unsurpassed responsiveness, precision and power efficiency.

copyblock.mainDescription: Through end-to-end engineering and design, Logitech G developed a robust wireless solution to solve the fundamental problems of latency, stability, and connectivity. The end result is LIGHTSPEED, a pro-grade wireless solution, that achieves wired-like performance.

media_tile_copy.text: Logitech G engineers worked through a complete end-to-end technology optimization from sensor to firmware, circuitry to antenna design. We tested and refined each component, focusing on the slowest link until nothing was slow.

copyblock.mainDescription: Quickly switch between HI and LO modes with the flick of a switch. In HI mode, G603 delivers peak performance with LIGHTSPEED 1ms report rate and up to 500 hours of non-stop gaming. When not gaming, simply switch to LO mode and extend battery life. LO mode reports at 8 ms for up to 18 months of use with 2 AA batteries.Battery life may vary based on user, battery discharge characteristics and computing conditions
Dual connectivity with LIGHTSPEED and BluetoothÂ® allows you to connect to and control multiple devices across platforms. Easily toggle between the two connected devices with a press of a button.

banner_copy_block.mainDescription: G603 wireless gaming mouse delivers up to 500 hours on 2 AA batteriesâ€”twice as long as our previous generation. Even with a single battery the G603 can last through up to 500 matches of League of LegendsÂ®. When battery is at 15%, both LED status indicator and Logitech Gaming Software (LGS) will notify you before the critical moment. You can also choose which side to place a single battery, for custom balancing.

bannercopyblock.mainDescription: G603 wireless gaming mouse delivers up to 500 hours on 2 AA batteriesâ€”twice as long as our previous generation. Even with a single battery the G603 can last through up to 500 matches of League of LegendsÂ®. You can also choose which side to place a single battery with no impact to performance for custom balancing. When battery is at 15%, both LED status indicator and Logitech Gaming Software (LGS) will notify you before the critical moment.

copyblock.mainDescription: The G603 wireless gaming mouse can be fully configured to match your preferences. G603 comes with 6 programmable buttons including on-the-fly DPI shifting through up to 5 sensitivity settings. Use LGS to assign custom commands, configure macros (sequences of clicks and keystrokes to simplify in-game actions and quickly execute complex tasks), store configuration profiles in the onboard memory, and more.Advanced features require Logitech Gaming Software, available for download at logitechg.com/downloads

Pair the G603 gaming mouse with the G613 wireless mechanical keyboard to acquire the complete wireless gaming desktop solution. G613 features advanced LIGHTSPEED wireless, Romer-G mechanical key switches, programmable G-keys, and more gaming features.

_x0033_.subtext: Wireless report rate in LO mode: 125 Hz (8 ms)
